website_summaries.verdict: An economical controller charger that is capable of charging 2 controllers in 2 hours.
pros: LED screen indicator makes it simple to see when a controller is charging or fully charged
Horizontal design ensures controllers remain stable in the station at all times
Comes with a 31-inch USB charging cable for added convenience
cons: LED indicator light sometimes stays green, regardless of whether a controller is fully charged

customer_reviews.title: Works great and worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: My young kids jacked up the micro USB charging ports on the front of the controllers. This charging station was a life saver. The charging ports are much more durable, easier for them to seat to charge, and has the red/green indicator for charging. This was an excellent investment from keeping me having to go buy new PS4 controllers due to the micro USB ports breaking. I highly recommend this above using the standard charging ports.
customer_reviews.author: JCSMITH

customer_reviews.title: Wished it wasn't dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Update Great customer service from the company. Quick responses and they are willing to do whatever is necessary to fix production. That's enough for me. Got this charger because it was sleek and looked cool. Unfortunately only one of the two charging ports working. I've tried swapping the controllers around and swapped power cables, but still no luck. The lights both work, but the second charging port doesn't charge, and the light just stays green. Would still recommend this product. I assume not all of them are like this.
customer_reviews.author: eBae

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED. BUT BEWARE, ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED. BUT BEWARE, IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR PLAYSTATION USB PORTS FREE, GET YOURSELF A USB ADAPTER AND PLUG THIS UP IN THE WALL OUTLET BECAUSE THIS DOESN'T COME WITH ONE
customer_reviews.author: QM44

customer_reviews.title: Gf has good taste
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present from my gf and let me just tell u she hit a nail on the head. Its sleek, looks very well made, the indicator is awesome, installing the controller to charge is easy and dont have to fight it like other chargers. also very compact, saves space on my small desk. very glad she got me this because i would of went with something more expensive, stupid me because this little guy handles its job extremely well. do recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Victor Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So much better than a cable. And it looks cool. Apparently dimming the lights on your controller will make the battery last alot longer. But I dont have that problem Because I'm to busy with life to play that long. Life ain't about video games. Go out and do something
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great PS4 remote control docking station
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 4 months ago and it works great to charge my controller's. It charges from the front of the controller and doesn't use the micro USB on the back. The main problem I run into with these types of chargers is it tends to break the micro USB but because you're using the port on the front it works allot better-putting the controllers into the base station.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Manha

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite PS4 Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this dock work awesome, it’s looks pretty cool next to my PS4! It is very convenient and it is an accessory that I have been missing out on. I really love that it charges using the bottom headphone ext port, rather than struggling to use the micro USB port at the top. I highly recommend this dual charging dock for those looking for a sleek looking space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget for a great Amazon Prime Price!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little gadget for a great price and does the job! Before my kids were hooking their remote control up to the actual PS4 which meant they were really close to the TV but now having this little gadget life is so much easier. It didn't come with the actual plug but it did come with the cable so I used a plug I already had and have it plugged into the wall so the remotes can charge 24/7. I would highly recommend this as it's small and takes up no space.
customer_reviews.author: KimW

customer_reviews.title: No more dead controllers! Works with PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my DualShock 4 controllers that are connected via Bluetooth to my Steam PC rig. For some reason, I have inconsistent results when attempting to charge them via microUSB cable, so I found I was having to keep them connected to a cable in order to use them. That is, until I found this handy charging station! Controllers can now charge in a reasonable amount of time (I'm usually never in a hurry and tend to rotate controllers). No more empty batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Maher Dakkak

customer_reviews.title: Best PS4 controller charger on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best PS4 charger on Amazon. It charges via the front port of the controller as opposed to the back USB port. The charging port alone makes this the best controller, but because it even has a charger Red/Green illuminated light makes these even better!
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: The best charger yet!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried other chargers and this one is the best. I like the fact that it uses the ports on the bottom of the controller instead of the smaller plug on the top like my older charger. A little easier to place it in the charger. The lights on the front are nice to see the charging status. Plus it looks great sitting on our entertainment center. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MM808

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and killed my controller
customer_reviews.text: After setting up the charger and placing my controller on there for a brief period of time I tested it. The controller was extraordinarily hot to the touch. My controller would not turn on at all so I attempted to resync it to my ps4. Upon plugging in the controller I discovered that it still wasn't turning on. I am out of a $60 controller due to a poor quality unlicensed product.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran A.

customer_reviews.title: Neat little charger!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a wim as one of those amazing deals, it’s actually really nice quality all around. Sturdy, expensive look, works great. No problems setting two controllers on which I’ve had with other dual chargers. Lights up to tell you that it’s contected correct. Definitely a nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your controllers fully charged, organized, saves your bateries from mishandling. Probably pays for itself.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenager son to keep his 2 controllers charged. In the past I've lost over 4 controllers because the batteries went dead and my kids were too lazy to keep them charged. Not any longer! Now the controllers are kept charged. Today my teenager son told me that there is one additional feature he loves: the glow light on the controller which keeps illuminated while it's plugged in, now glows toward the wall and not towards his face. Another bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Hermann Pais

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids to go with their new PS4 they got for Christmas. Right out of the box the lights didn’t work according instructions. After putting both BRAND NEW controllers on the charger the controllers no longer worked. They wouldn’t turn on at all. My children were upset not to be able to use their Christmas present. Major disappointment!!!!! Thanks to this crap product I now have to spend $100 on new controllers!!! Do not waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Convenient design
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as I had hoped it would. The last charging cord got destroyed when the robot vacuum ran it over, so I opted for something that would charge both controllers at the same time, so we could alternate. Bonus, that the lights indicate when the controller is charged. Side note, I have a toddler who likes to play with the controllers, and has actually dropped the charging station (on the second day we had this) and caused something to come loose, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I have used this product for a sufficient amount of time before writing a review. Some products may seem very good at first but will tear up soon after. However, that was not the case with this product. I have been using it for quite some time now, and I have had no issues with it at all. It charges my controllers very quickly and efficiently, and does not over charge when i leave them plugged in. One thing that could be better is if it came with a wall plug instead of a USB only. Also, thing looks pretty sleek sitting next to my PlayStation.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Fran

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was terrified by kids would stand on the perpetually dangling USB cords attached to our PS4 and it would wind up being yanked off the TV stand. This little gizmo resolves that, tidied up the ugly cords and now lives next to our couch so I can avoid the 24 steps of exercise I need to take to switch controllers. We really like it. The kids struggle to get the controllers attached sometimes but overall we couldn't be (much) happier.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: How Far We've Come..
customer_reviews.text: I kind of wasn't expecting to have to buy a charger for a controller. The last PS I had was the PS2. There I was playing KH3 when I saw the message "low battery". Silly me! I thought it needed a physical battery. Plugged into my PC without a problem. So far I've charged the controller once and its lasted days. That's longer than my phone holds a charge. So I was happy with the charger. It arrived in a couple of days and I didn't have to wait long to tune into the magnificent journeys and adventures of Sora, Donald, and Goofy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This very well may be the best thing I've purchased in a long time. Plugs right into your PS4 or power brick (not included) and works just like it says! Also has some nice rubber grips on the bottom of it to keep it from sliding off of a table or whatever it sits on. Lights on the front of the charger tell you when your controller is fully charged. It even shows you a status on how charged the controller(s) is!
customer_reviews.author: overdeux

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a new controller. Charged the new controller on it and it will no longer sync or stay on. Do not buy. Just use the cord to charge your controller UPDATE: If this happens I found a solution to fix it. Take the dock set the controller in the dock while the dock is plugged it. Take the charging cable plug it into the PS4 and while the controller is setting in the charging dock plug the charging cable into it as well so that you’ve got two different sources of charge and then the controller will automatically sync and turn on with the PS4. (:
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: No Fair
customer_reviews.text: I read all the great reviews. Have had mine two weeks and it won't charge anything. Checked the cord, even bought a new USB for it, didn't fix it. Even a dead controller, shows green that it's fully charged. It's such a pain to return such a low ticket item so will just toss and try a different one I guess. I've never really had a defective product except once in 10 years here so I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ladyesmiles

customer_reviews.title: Compact and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This product does not look like much when compared to the other chargers out there, however; I ordered one and it works great. Here are the cool features. You do not have to plug it into your PS4, you can plug it into any other USB charger and this way you do not have to have the controllers next to the PS4. The status of GREEN and RED are great to know if your controller is ready to go, and also once your controller is fully charged, you do not have to worry about overcharging. Very compact and barely noticeable on display.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: never have a dead controller agian
customer_reviews.text: never have a dead controller again. hang any Sony controller for PS pro ps4 slim or PS 4 on this charging base. be sure you have the charging ports in the middle of the controller in between the two thumb sticks will be a slot and a hole to the right which holds the controller in the charger. the chargers display will light up red while charging then change green when fully charged.its been my experience that only official Sony PS 4 controllers have these ports some after market controllers do not have these ports. if your controller doesn't have these ports to hang it on this charging station do not by this charging station it will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a while
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my four controllers. They've worked great for about 6 months then one of them started going bad. One still works perfectly so it's not all bad. The indicator lights never seemed to work well either. I expected it to be red when low and green when charged. However; when I plug in a low controller, it turns red for about 10 seconds then green so you can't tell if the controller is low or charged. If I had to do it over again, I would not purchase this item and spend a few bucks more for something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ronyace

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and one of them is great. The second one is no longer working. I noticed about 2 weeks ago that it was doing this weird flashing thing. I tried to reach out on amazon and for some reason it said that the entire item/page was no longer available. I just went to look again, and here I am. I wish I could contact the seller but I can't find a way to. When these work, they're fantastic. The charging screens are very well done, bright and have a sharp image. I think that our defective one is just a dud. But still, I'm stuck with an non-functioning product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fully charge
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy this for my son, who had always charged his controllers with the console itself. I read good reviews and the price was good. It's pretty durable. Easy to use. I'm not sure if I have a defective one or not, but this unit charges the controllers and even though it says they're fully charged, they're not. He takes them off to use them and within about 15 minutes, they're dead. I am not a gamer but I'm pretty sure a fully charged controller should last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: beachlover0727

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just over 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product, until it conveniently died just a couple of weeks after the return window. As you can see in the pic, there’s no lights at all on on the charger - it’s supposed to have a red and green light. I unplugged, replugged, nothing. Cheapness I can handle, something breaking after a little over a month is not acceptable. Don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: Says both controllers are fully charged when I know for a fact they are not. Had both controllers on for over 3 hours and nothing. Tried different plugs and wires but still doesn’t work. Keeps lighting up Green but my controllers won’t turn on. Seemed too good to be true. Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bogart

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This product works just OK for me. The connections that are supposed to power the charging don't consistently work. They are supposed to turn RED when charging and GREEN when charged. There are times that the rear connection doesn't work without some major jiggling. But since I typically don't charge 2 controllers simultaneously I don't have to mess with the back dock, and the front one works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Sounding

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 charging port on the station works!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately only one of the two charging ports working. I've tried swapping the controllers around and swapped power cables, but no luck. The lights both work, but the second charging port doesn't charge, and the light just stays red. How frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Alr610

customer_reviews.title: Use your own power adapter?
customer_reviews.text: First charging station I've ever purchased that doesn't come with its own wall plug. Basically says "use your own adapter...". (you only get a REALLY short usb cord) If you are like me, and want to charge the controllers further away from where all of your components are, this is not the charger for you, unless you want to pay another $10 for a wall charger or use one from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: steven rogers

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying this it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. The only benefit that I got from this item was the cable it does not work when you connect the cable to the item so we can charge the controls the controls will not charge with this it does not work I thought that the first time that I purchased this in December my kids broke it the second time I bought it I realized that it was a piece of trash it’s all pretty from the outside but it does not work it looks nice but it doesn’t work I completely regret purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap solution
customer_reviews.text: The connection where they plug in are a little tight, it did not work for one of my controllers but probably because a kid shoved some stuff (probably gum) in the charging spot. Good product though.
customer_reviews.author: BuckyReview

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Good to keep controllers charged and ready to use. My only complaint is that it only charges them up to 75% and stops (stated in the description). I love that it stops charging to prevent overcharging, but I wish it would stop at 80-90% of battery life. Also, the colors on the charger are a good feature to show if the controllers are charging or not.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Adams

customer_reviews.title: 120v adapter needed
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of pointless without a 120v adapter. If you have to use the PS4 power to charge the controller then that defeats the purpose of a wireless controller, I might as well plug in the charging cable for the controller. Unless your ps4 is constantly on (which it won't be as it auto turns off) I wouldn't buy. Would be a great product had they provided 120v adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Alex The Great

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Does good for charging and storing you controllers. Can be a little difficult to get them plugged in using the bottom ports. There aren't really any guides to getting the controller in the right angle to plug it in. Also if you have any controller accessories, you will have to remove them before charging each time.
customer_reviews.author: TherealNeil

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The lights only show green, even when you plug a completely dead controller in it. One that had been on the dock for a week. We rarely use our PS4 so I didn’t realize it wasn’t working until outside the return window. I should have gone with my first instinct that it wasn’t operator error.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost caused a fire...
customer_reviews.text: This almost caused a fire. Owned for 6 months without issues. Worked very well UNTIL it melted. My kids smelled something burning in the basement. We found the micro usb charger melting at the point of connection to the device. Could have caused a serious fire. Recommend AGAINST buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect well to controllers
customer_reviews.text: When you set the controllers on the charger you have to wiggle and fight to get them connected. Sometimes the charger shows green lights meaning the controllers are charged, but they actually are not. Very disappointed, will be looking for a better charger.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McLean

customer_reviews.title: Gamer's choice
customer_reviews.text: So first, let me tell you, I am not a gamer, but every member of my family is and I bought each of my kids and my husband one of these for Christmas. They have all loved them so far. The controllers stay charged and ready to be swapped out when they are doing long hours of online gaming. They haven't had any complaints about how they work and have been quite happy with how little room it takes up and how will it charges the controllers. I am happy that I don't need to trip over the cords that are no longer attached to the console trying to charge the controller while still playing..... just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Never go without a charged remote again
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use our remote all day. Before we bought this product we'd have to wait for the remotes to charge and be left high and dry in the middle of a gaming session or a TV binge. As well, you had to leave the PS4 on all the time to charge the remote. But now we always have a fully charged remote even if the PS4 is off. Easy and simple to use. Installation is idiot proof. Even my mom (bless her heart!) can put the remote on the charger without confusion or struggle--and she just learned how to turn on a laptop a year ago. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Good but only one minor issue not a deal breaker tho
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, nice handy place to keep my controllers when i am not using them too. Only problem is that i feel they have decreased my battery life on my controllers which is a problem but i always have another controller charged and ready to go. I just do not like knowing they have a shorter battery life cause of it. But beats the hell out of plugging a usb cable. Only major players should purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: joram

customer_reviews.title: Better than tracking down unsightly cables.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since controllers went wireless, I had to have a charging dock like this. This is the most recent one for the current Playstation. They get better every generation. This one's pretty good. The controllers aren't a big hassle to situate. They sit neatly. The charging notification lights work, but are reversed for which controller is charging. which isn't major. It's better than unsightly cables.
customer_reviews.author: Farley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t want to charge the controllers
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing but apparently it doesn’t want to charge the controllers. We have tried it for 2 days now and thee controllers don’t want to charge. It will show its charging but not actually charge... not sure what to do at this point and it doesn’t seem to work :( it sucks because we were looking forward to these
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: kid and break proof friendly
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Super easy to plug in and it’s functional for even a child to take it right out the box and connect it. The chargers I normally buy my son eventually break away from the port and I find myself buying quite a few charges. So when I saw this I decided to give it a try. It’s perfect, he can charge a couple at a time and he’s not constantly pulling at the wire while it’s charging. Normally he plays with the remote as it’s charging, but now with a double charger as he’s playing the other one is charging. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Yami

customer_reviews.title: The charging deck works great!
customer_reviews.text: It's simple to use, charges very fast charging and isn't bulky. Make sure your PS4 controllers have the appropriate USB port at the base of the controller and not in the front of the controller otherwise it won't fit on the charging deck. Some controllers don't have the same set up as the stock PS4 controllers do re: USB and earphone ports. I know, I had to return one the other day and re-order the correct one for the deck.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I was using usb cords to keep my controllers charged but this is a game changer. No more wires while I play. It charges a full charge in around 2 hours. It is small enough that it will sit on any shelf or table. I love the fact that when it is charged it turns itself off. My one controller would not charge through a usb cable but with this item it will now charge up and hold the charge. You will not regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Noddy Forever

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Got this charger cuz the charging cables for my controllers were busted, and I thought it'd make sense to upgrade to a charger dock so there aren't cords everywhere. The charging dock is compact with an easy to understand and intuitive display. My controllers charged and work perfectly! It does take a bit of time to charge the controllers from literally less than 0 battery left in them, but it's worth it to not have all those long cords and an easy way to get them charged at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great at first. It was very easy to use and more convenient than plugging the controllers using two separated mini USB cables. Unfortunately, it only lasted about 7 months and now it does not longer charge the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great so far. It charges my controllers quickly, the display is bright and it's very easy to determine whether they are charged or not. The only thing is that because the charger is very narrow, I feel like I have to be careful when placing the controllers on there. I have accidentally turned the PS4 back on before, and also dont want to mess up the port which sticks off of the base by not being careful.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: charging indicator doesn't work but it charges
customer_reviews.text: Its sort of difficult to get the controllers on the charging port, but once on it charges. It is supposed to show the status of charging controllers, but mine seems to just show random green or red controller indicators. Sometimes I will plug in a controller and the other indicator will turn red. I am not sure what the issue is, but it is working otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hodges

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I made sure my USB charger block was the correct corresponding voltage. I left my controller on this charger for about four hours. I went to pick up my controller and it was too hot to touch. The controller reeks of burned/melted plastic and had gotten so hot that it made cracking noises as it cooled down. My controller is broken. I'm beyond upset because I check reviews. Apparently Amazon deletes poor reviews these days!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Eater

customer_reviews.title: i am just waiting for me to buy 2 deul shock controllers to test Bebcool with.
customer_reviews.text: BEBONCOOL PS4 CONTROLLER DEUL SHOCK CONTROLLER CHARGING STATION has arrived & i have recieved it. The only reason why i have not used it yet to try it out....is because i have not yet bought one &/or 2 exstra playstation Deul Shock controllers to use it with & to test it with the Beboncool Ps4 Deul Shock controller charging station Yet! & that is all i can tell you! & yes Bebcool charging station is pluggable into the front of the Ps4 Pro!
customer_reviews.author: qwhittlesey

customer_reviews.title: Great stand.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We’ve been using this charger stand for months and had no problems at all. If I had to knitpick, it’s a little hard to place the controller in the back slot if there’s a controller still in front. But that’s so minor. And only because the controllers go in at a slight angle so it’s a little hard to line up without seeing. I still like the stand and like that it uses the bottom jack instead the top.
customer_reviews.author: Waneta

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I had been meaning to buy a charging stand for a while now and now that this has arrived I'm wondering why I took so long to make the decision! The stand is nice, sturdy, and charges like the PS4. It helps that I can plug the stand cord into a usb outlet so now my PS4 usb ports are free. The light does stay red until the controller hits 100% according to the indicator on my PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Troi

customer_reviews.title: Great design, easy indicator shows you everything
customer_reviews.text: We thought we had 2 controllers that would no longer take a charge. (A $100 problem). We replaced he cables and still no dice. We bought this charger and it turns out it was the warbled-out jacks at the top of the controller. Plugged them in via the bottom jack and wah-lah! Keep them on there now and they are always ready. Love the 2 PS4-shaped red and green colored lights, indicating which controller is charged and which on is not. Great design, maybe the kids won’t destroy this in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Backwoods Mister

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! :)
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing games on their PS4, but they were terrible at putting the controllers away. Not only does this keep the controllers organized but it charges them as well. I'll admit that I was hesitant to purchase this as I didn't think it would work. I was wrong! Not only does it charge both at the same time, but it charges it quickly. When the lights are green it means the controllers are fully charged. If it is still charging then the color will be red. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PBJMom

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger -- Main thing to know about it is probably that seating your controller on there is smooth and easy. I've had ones that were a bit fiddly in the past with the connectors, but this one works perfectly and the controllers are guided by the design right to their target. Excellent. I need to check if they make something similar for my Move Controllers, now! :D
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast Charge
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos got excited about a game they are playing and pulled the charger from its port as it was connected to the controller at the time. And it broke. We jump online and found one of reasonable pricing yet charged wirelessly. We found the Benboncool because it is cool. My 8 yr old hooked it up and was playing in 15 minutes. When he said mom it’s charged, I couldn’t believe. My kids are home due to the COVID-19 and I need things to work fast!!!!! Best Buy ever. Now I need to buy one more controller so I can play!
customer_reviews.author: Narva B.

customer_reviews.title: Good charger, not so great cord.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product five months ago and it’s been great. It’s only been in two places the entire time I’ve had it and hasn’t been moved or wiggled around but for some reason the cord has stopped working well. I have to move the cord around to get it to charge and the second I let go of it, it turns back off which is leaving my controllers only getting charged to one bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Why Did I Wait 4 1/2 Years To Order This?
